hibernate-mapping.query: select s from LkuData s where s.lkuId = ?
select s from LkuData s where s.lkuTypeName = ?
select s from LkuData s where s.lkuValue = ?
select s from LkuData s where s.lkuAttribute = ?
select s from LkuData s where s.lkuAttribute = ? and s.lkuTypeName = ?
select s from LkuData s where s.lkuTypeName = ? and s.lksData.lkpValueCode = ?
select s from LkuData s where upper(s.lkuValue) = upper(?) and upper(s.lkuTypeName) = upper(?)
select s from LkuData s where upper(s.lkuValue) = upper(?) and upper(COALESCE(s.lkuAttribute,'')) like upper(?) and upper(s.lkuTypeName) = upper(?)
